title: InputGuard Extension
description: A privacy-first Chrome extension that detects and blocks sensitive inputs (passwords, IMEIs, account numbers) using ML-based NER and regex validation, ensuring safe conversations inside ChatGPT.

title: Multi-Agent Recruitment Assistant
description: A multi-agent AI system that analyzes resumes, evaluates candidates, generates personalized insights, and automates communication and interview workflows for recruiters.

title: Thought Guide Reasoning Chatbot
description: An offline desktop chatbot using local LLMs to deliver structured, multi-step reasoning and strategic decision workflows without internet dependency.

title: RAGInsight
description: An intelligent RAG-powered document query agent that lets users ask smart questions about any document with full transparency of the retrieval, grading, refinement, and generation pipeline.

title: Browser Control Agent
description: An AI-powered browser automation agent that lets users control a real browser through natural language, enabling product search, form filling, comparison, and local discovery via conversational commands. Built with a modular NLU → planning → execution architecture using FastAPI, Playwright, LLMs, and a real-time React chat interface with streaming action updates.
